title: Support Umemura Farm through Furusato Tax
lead: Receive asparagus as a gift for your donation! Save on taxes while supporting local communities.

section1.title: What is Furusato Tax?
section1.body:
It’s a system that allows you to donate to a region you want to support, and receive local specialties in return.
At Umemura Farm in Imari City, we offer fresh asparagus as a return gift for your donation.

section2.title: Save on taxes and get asparagus!
section2.body:
Normally, donations to local governments are partially tax-deductible through income and resident tax returns.
However, with the Furusato Tax system, the full donation amount (minus a ¥2,000 personal contribution) is eligible for deduction.
*The deduction limit varies depending on your income.
For details, please visit <link>Official Ministry of Internal Affairs site</link>.

section3.title: Your donation empowers local communities
section3.body: Your contribution supports agriculture and revitalization efforts in the region. It’s a way to enjoy something delicious while making a difference.

section4.title: Return Gift Options
items: 1kg delivered once or in four installments

section5.title: Product Details
items: Spring spears until mid-May / Summer spears from late May onward.

Single delivery: Mainly S/M sizes, but larger sizes may be included depending on the season.
(Extra-thick L and up: Feb–mid-Mar, L size: mid-May–Jul)
4 deliveries: A mix of M, L, 2L, and 3L sizes.

The thickness and quantity of spears vary by harvest season.
(Spring: thicker, fewer spears / Summer/Autumn: thinner, more spears)
